title: Treasury Inflation-Protected Securities: What Investors Should Know About TIPS
sub_head: Inflation-wary investors are flocking to TIPS rather than to conventional bonds. But they might not understand the drawbacks as well as they should.
body:
TIPS have suddenly moved to center stage for investors, as the surge in inflation has drawn new interest in Treasury inflation-protected securities.
But how much do investors really know about these securities, other than their alluring name?
